question: Radial balance involves a central piece from which all other elements seem to radiate to arrange themselves in circular symmetry.<image 1>
description: The image depicts a modern dining room with a round table at its center. The table is surrounded by four chairs, each with a quilted backrest and cushioned seats. The chairs are evenly spaced around the table, creating a symmetrical arrangement. Above the table hangs a large, cylindrical pendant light fixture, which is centered directly above the table. The walls feature a textured, earth-toned paneling, and there is a tall, slender vase placed against one wall. The room has a dark floor and a window with sheer curtains on one side. The overall layout and placement of objects suggest a balanced and harmonious design.
